definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: To most military analysts, these redeployments make a lot of sense.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數軍事分析家看來，這些重新部署十分在理。

definition: to be left speechless/unable to respond
dumbstruck and unable to reply (idiom); left speechless/at a loss for words
to twist words and force logic (idiom)/sophistry/loud rhetoric making up for fallacious argument/shoving false arguments down people's throats
words from the bottom of one's heart
to hit the mark with a comment (idiom)/to say sth spot on
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
